name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor_text: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

name: Icatian Priest
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Grelden knelt and felt the cool, dry hand of the priest on his brow. Hours later, when his wits returned, he was covered in his enemies' blood on the field of victory.

name: Angelic Page
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Charging Paladin
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

name: Venerable Monk
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Angelic Protector
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
—Crovax

name: Serra Advocate
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: An angel's blessing prepares a soldier for war better than a thousand military drills.

name: Sustainer of the Realm
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

name: Angel of Mercy
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

name: Serra Angel
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

name: Twilight Shepherd
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
When Twilight Shepherd enters the battlefield, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Luminous Angel
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "The spread of evil's destruction shall always be matched by the rise of the noble fallen."

name: Reya Dawnbringer
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "You have not died until I consent."

name: Healing Salve
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Angelsong
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

name: Otherworldly Journey
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."
—Journal found in Numai

name: Pacifism
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: Even those born to battle could only lay their blades at Akroma's feet.

name: Serra's Boon
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.
flavor_text:
"The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns."
—Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

name: Angelic Benediction
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

—Rafiq of the Many

oracle_text: Enchant permanent

name: Righteous Cause
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Until the world unites in vengeful fury and Phage is destroyed, I will not stay my hand."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

oracle_text: Flying, trample

name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Foul Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

name: Daggerclaw Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
Daggerclaw Imp can't block.
flavor_text: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

name: Dusk Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

name: Overeager Apprentice
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.

name: Stinkweed Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.

Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Soot Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a player casts a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"If one gets in your chimney, you're going to need a long wick and a barrel of bangstuff to get it out."
—Hob Heddil

name: Demon's Jester
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Flying

flavor_text: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.

name: Souldrinker

oracle_text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.
flavor_text: Don't drink and thrive.

name: Cackling Imp
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic

set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:

—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

—Liliana Vess

name: Unholy Strength
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic

name: Cruel Edict

—Phage the Untouchable

name: Dark Banishing
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say ‘death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
—William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

name: Oni Possession
